snippet: Mr. Mason was a combative player in the Knicks’ mid-1990s heyday, a tough defensive specialist who sometimes clashed with opponents and, occasionally, with his own coaches.
abstract: Family, friends and mourners with ties to NBA gather to pay respects to Anthony Mason, onetime New York Knick who died on February 28.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Mason was a combative player in the Knicks’ mid-1990s heyday, a tough defensive specialist who sometimes clashed with opponents and, occasionally, with his own coaches.

headline.main: Anthony Mason, a Former Knick and a Native Son of Queens, Is Mourned
headline.print_headline: Former Knick, Native Son of Queens, Is Mourned
